Title: The Fighter
Writer: Scott Silver (screenplay), Paul Tamasy (screenplay), Eric Johnson (screenplay), Paul Tamasy (story), Eric Johnson (story), Keith Dorrington (story)
Actors: Mark Wahlberg, Christian Bale, Amy Adams, Melissa Leo
Plot: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.
Production: Relativity, Closest to the Hole, Mandeville Films
